author: Erik Adkins
description: A rye whiskey and maple syrup sour served short and straight-up. You'd perhaps have expected this cocktail to be more drawn out.
name: Filibuster
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
